title: [INTERNATIONAL TEAM] - [SILVER/GOLD]
body:
What is the level ?
--> Silver / Gold

What language are we going to talk about ?
--> Only english (if we have 2 spanish or 2 french, then will have to speak english)

When we will play ?
--> We will play the Tuesday (21h-00h), Thursday (21h-00h), and when we can, we will play the week end. (Hour on UTC +1)

How we will speak ?
--> We will speak on discord or teamspeak

Who is the shoot caller ?
--> The shoot caller is [JUNGLE] Etherfictus

Who should I contact to be in the team ?
--> You should contact etherfictus69 on league of legend.

See you on the game.
Etherfictus
